effect.en: Switch 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon with their Active Pokémon.
effect.fr: Échangez l'un des Pokémon de Banc de votre adversaire contre son Pokémon Actif.
effect.es: Cambia 1 de los Pokémon en Banca de tu rival por su Pokémon Activo.
effect.it: Scambia uno dei Pokémon nella panchina del tuo avversario con il suo Pokémon attivo.
effect.pt: Switch 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon with their Active Pokémon.
effect.de: Tausche 1 Pokémon auf der Bank deines Gegners gegen sein Aktives Pokémon aus.

effect.en: During your next turn, this Pokémon can't attack.
effect.fr: Pendant votre prochain tour, ce Pokémon ne peut pas attaquer.
effect.es: Durante tu próximo turno, este Pokémon no puede atacar.
effect.it: Durante il tuo prossimo turno, questo Pokémon non può attaccare.
effect.pt: During your next turn, this Pokémon can't attack.
effect.de: Während deines nächsten Zuges kann dieses Pokémon nicht angreifen.

description.en: It drinks in seawater and jets it from its rear to propel itself. It's very sensitive to the scent of blood.
